value.title: Scan open source components for vulnerabilities and license ratings in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Scan open-source components for security vulnerabilities and assess their license ratings when your application builds in Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Improve your cloud security posture with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: Learn how you can strengthen your security posture through Azure Security Center.

value.title: Search and organize repository history by using GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to search and organize repository history by using filters, blame, and cross-linking on GitHub.

value.title: Secure your Azure SQL Database
value.excerpt: Secure an Azure SQL database to keep the information safe and diagnose potential security concerns as they happen.

value.title: Simulate and generate empirical distributions in Python
value.excerpt: Learn how to simulate and generate empirical distributions in Python

value.title: Spark architecture fundamentals
value.excerpt: Spark architecture fundamentals

value.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
value.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

value.title: Transcribe speech input to text
value.excerpt: Speech to text from the speech service, known as speech recognition, enables real time transcription of audio streams into text. Your applications, tools, or devices can consume, display, and take action on this text as command input.

value.title: Translate speech with the speech service
value.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

value.title: Upload your project by using GitHub best practices
value.excerpt: Learn to upload your existing project to GitHub.

value.title: Using IAAS support with Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: There are a variety of commonly used SAP-certified operating systems supported by SAP running on Azure VMs, and there are also several different methods of provisioning storage for SAP workloads in Azure. In this module, you will learn the SAP recommended support products and VM types as well as the network, database, and monitoring requirements.

value.title: 60 seconds to a Linkerd service mesh on AKS | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: See just how easy it is to deploy a service mesh to your AKS cluster. William Morgan, maintainer of the open source service mesh Linkerd, joins Scott Hanselman to demonstrate just how easy it is to deploy Linkerd. Together they explore how to debug a live microservices application using the service mesh,
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/f8R3Y_geZwU" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: An overview of Azure Integration Services | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure Integration Services brings together API Management, Logic Apps, Service Bus, and Event Grid as a reliable, scalable platform for integrating on-premises and cloud-based applications, data, and processes across your enterprise. [04:41] Demo Start   Azure Integration Services overview https://aka.ms/azfr/527/01

value.title: Azure AD Managed Service Identity | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Arturo Lucatero joins Donovan Brown to discuss Azure AD Managed Service Identity, which can be used to authenticate to any service that supports Azure AD authentication. For more information, see: What is Managed Service Identity (MSI) for Azure resources? (docs): https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/managed-service-identity/overview

value.title: Azure Automation | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jenny Hunter joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Automation, which has seen several new improvements including support for Python 2, the ability to run against local Linux machines, the ability to run against any Azure VM with no setup (Run Command), and native Azure alert integration. [03:27] Demo
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/DgMJC9bWWrE" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Friday | Apache Kafka on HDInsight
value.excerpt: Raghav Mohan joins Scott Hanselman to talk about Apache Kafka on HDInsight, which added the open-source distributed streaming platform last year to complete a scalable, big data streaming scenario on Azure. The service has come a long way since - processing millions of events/sec, petabytes of data/day
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gttwnNDHuZ4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure Availability Zones
value.excerpt: Raj Ganapathy joins Scott Hanselman to discuss the new addition to Azure's resiliency offerings – Availability Zones. Azure Availability Zones are fault-isolated locations within an Azure region to help protect customers applications and data from datacenter-level failures with independent power, network,

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure CDN: Dynamic Site Acceleration
value.excerpt: Richard Li joins Scott Hanselman to discuss the new Dynamic Site Acceleration (DSA) optimization for Azure CDN, and how it can be used in combination with standard CDN caching features to measurably improve the performance of web pages with dynamic content. value.title: Azure Friday | Visually build pipelines for Azure Data Factory V2

value.title: Azure Reserved VM Instances (RIs) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Yashesvi Sharma joins Scott Hanselman to discuss how to significantly reduce costs up to 72 percent compared to pay-as-you-go prices with one-year or three-year terms on Windows and Linux virtual machines (VMs). When you combine the cost savings gained from Azure RIs with the added value of the Azure

value.title: Azure Security Center – Just-in-Time Network Access
value.excerpt: Cloud hosted VM’s are prime targets for RDP and SSH brute force attacks because management ports are typically left in an open state. With Just in Time network access, you can put any of your ports, not just management ports, into a default deny state until a user requires access. Once access is requested,

value.title: Build ETL pipelines collaboratively using Git integration in Azure Data Factory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Enable Git source control (Azure DevOps Git or GitHub) in your data factories to do collaboration, source control, change tracking, change difference, continuous integration, and deployment. value.title: Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM) with Azure Security Center | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure Security Center enables you to strengthen your security posture. Yuri Diogenes joins Scott Hanselman to show how Security Center helps you identify and perform the hardening tasks recommended as security best practices and implement them across your machines, data services, and apps.  0:00 - Intro
